channel.title: Portals

item.title: Portals
item.dc:creator: @elobire elobire
item.description:
@elobire wrote:

i need some help making portals, the command i got so far is:

case 7322: // barbarian village tele teleportToX = 3082; teleportToY = 3420; sendMessage("You teleport to Barbarian vilage!"); break;

but is their any way for options to come up so i can select multiple places to go from just one portal?

thanks in advance,
-Elobire

Read full topic
